siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, Happy 47th birthday to Jon’s father-in-law, Rev. Mark Buetow! Stan got notified about the Apple Card, he seems so excited about it that he thought Jon was too. We did something impossible to our bodies in the past week. Both Stan and Jon made trips to Burger King…

frontmatter.title: The Impossible Episode
tags: life with a twist of lemon
